subject: p19991135
History: Right VATS converted to thoracotomy and right upper lobectomy.
Findings: In comparison with the study of, one of the right chest tubes appears to have been removed. No definite pneumothorax is appreciated. Post-surgical changes persist in the right hemithorax and there is extensive subcutaneous gas along the right lateral chest wall.
